subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Michael Finley and Manu Ginóbili rose above the ragged fray of a jittery Game 6, playing for the San Antonio Spurs as if they refused to slip into the off-season.
snippet: Michael Finley and Manu Ginóbili rose above the ragged fray of a jittery Game 6, playing for the San Antonio Spurs as if they refused to slip into the off-season.
